attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: scrap free travel for under 18`s or make everyone under 18 use a pass no if`s but`s or maybe`s. or make free travel term time only between certain hours and out of those hour charge the so called underagers the same fair adults pay this will the aleviate the problem of bus drivers and and passengers being attacked because they can be tracked.
